title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 369 - State Assistance Projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 369 - State Assistance Projects

State Regulations

Subpart 369-1 - General Provisions (§ 369-1.1 to 369-1.6)

Subpart 369-2 - Municipal Waste Reduction, Recycling, Household Hazardous Waste Collection and Beverage Container Assistance Capital Projects (§ 369-2.1 to 369-2.4)

Subpart 369-3 - MUNICIPAL WASTE REDUCTION AND RECYCLING EDUCATION, PROMOTION, PLANNING AND COORDINATION PROJECTS (§ 369-3.1 to 369-3.4)

Subpart 369-4 - Municipal Household Hazardous Waste Collection and Disposal Projects (§ 369-4.1 to 369-4.4)

Subpart 369-5 - Targeted Priority Area Municipal Waste Reduction and Recycling Projects (§ 369-5.1 to 369-5.2)

Subpart 369-6 - NONHAZARDOUS MUNICIPAL LANDFILL CLOSURE PROJECTS (§ 369-6.1 to 369-6.4)

Subpart 369-7 - Nonhazardous Municipal Landfill Gas Management Projects (§ 369-7.1 to 369-7.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 369

Amended

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law
§§ 1-0101, 3-0301, titles 1, 5, 7 and 10, of article 27, 54-0103, titles 5 and 7 of article 54, and title 1 of article
70. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
